{{Wired embedded system |brand=StarFive |model=VisionFive |revision=2 (V1.3B) |asin=B0BGM6STN8 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=85 |est_release_date=09/2022 |type=single-board computer, development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=6 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=StarFive |cpu1_model=JH7110;JH7110, C2239-T6M074, 049D331; |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25LQ128ESIG |ram1=8 GiB |ram1_brand=Biwin |ram1_model=BWMZCX32H2A-64G-X |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, NGFF (M.2), USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Motorcomm |eth_chip2_model=YT8531C |eth_chip3_brand=Motorcomm |eth_chip3_model=YT8531C |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=1Mbit SPI Flash;Winbond;W25X10CLSNIG;;1;,,, 4Kbit I2C Serial EEPROM;Giantec;GT24C04A;;1;,,, Super Speed USB 3.0 Host Controller;VIA;VL805;;1;,,, USB PD Fast Charging Protocol Sink Controller;WCH;CH224;;1;,,, PMIC for Multi-Core High Performance System;X-Powers;AXP15060;;1;,,, Precision Power Distribution Switch;TOLL Microelectronic;TMI6262AL;;4;,,, Precision Voltage Supervisor w/ Int Watchdog Timer;SGMicro;SGM820;;1;,,, 80mΩ Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;AeroSemi;MT9700;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, 4.8A Charging IC w/ Fast Charging Protocol;Injoinic Tech;IP2315;;1;,,, 5V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, 18V 5A Synchro Step-Down DC/DC Converter;SCT;SCT2250;;1;,,, 300mA Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Diodes Inc;AP7331;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchro Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089A;;1;,,, 30V High Current Boost LED Driver;Silergy;SY7203;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;2; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0, Audio out (3.5 mm), MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, SPI, I2C, I2S, GPIO, UART, PoE expansion header |stock_boot=U-Boot;2021.10; |stock_os=Linux;5.15.0;Debian; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=user |default_pass=starfive }} {{TagLine|RISC-V Development Board}} :[https://www.starfivetech.com/en/site/boards Product page] {{•}} [https://www.starfivetech.com/uploads/VisionFive%202%20isionDocumentation.pdf Documentation]
"StarFive VisionFive 2 V1.3B" is silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[StarFive]] JH7110 -U74x4 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad-Core RISC-V (RV64GC) 64-bit *GPU: Imagination BXE-4-32 @600MHz :(OpenGL ES3.2, OpenVG 1.2, Vulkan 1.2) :VPU: H.264/H.265 decoder up to 4Kp30, :H.265 encoder up to 1080p30 *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash (''[[GigaDevice]]''), :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 8GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM (''Biwin'') *Network: 2x GbE ports (1x w/ PoE support) *PCIe: NGFF M.2 (M-key) socket w/ PCIe 2.0 *USB: 4x USB 3.1 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB (Type-C) supporting USB :PD 2.0 and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 or :5V Power from the GPIO Pin 2 and 4 or :via PoE via PoE expansion header
===Models=== *[[StarFive VisionFive]] • [https://www.starfivetech.com/en/site/boards PPage] :CPU: ''[[StarFive]]'' JH7100 @1.0GHz *[[StarFive VisionFive 2]] • [https://www.starfivetech.com/en/site/boards PPage] :CPU: ''[[StarFive]]'' JH7110 @1.5GHz
===Links=== *[https://liliputing.com/starfive-visionfive-2-single-board-pc-with-a-quad-core-risc-v-chip-coming-in-november/ ''StarFive VisionFive 2 single-board PC'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/risc-v-based-visionfive-2-launched-on-kickstarter/ ''RISC-V based VisionFive 2 launched'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/02/12/starfive-visionfive-2-sbc-review-debian-12/ ''StarFive VisionFive 2 RISC-V SBC using Debian 12'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/08/23/starfive-visionfive-2-quad-core-risc-v-sbc-linux/ ''StarFive VisionFive 2 quad-core RISC-V SBC launched'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2023/risc-v-business-testing-starfives-visionfive-2-sbc ''RISC-V Business: Testing StarFive's VisionFive 2 SBC'' on '''Jeff Gerling''' blog]
